DOC.brief_summary: Dietary fibre seem relevant role body weight management . In acute study investigator find high viscous-high gelling pectin increase feeling satiety . The objective study study effect 2 week supplementation high gelling-high viscous fibre high gelling-high viscous non-fibre control energy intake . The investigator measure difference ad libitum energy intake 15 day pectin 15 day control supplement . The investigator measure differences 24h feeling satiety , fast blood glucose insulin , fermentation composition microbiota .
DOC.brief_title: Fiber Longer Term Study Energy Intake
DOC.criteria: Age : 1830 year BMI : 18.525 kg/m2 Healthy : judge participant H2 producer Weight loss weight gain 5 kg last 2 month Using energy restrict diet last 2 month Lack appetite reason Restrained eater Smoking Heavy alcohol use : > 5 drinks/day Reported stomach bowel diseases disorder ( e.g . irritable bowel syndrome ) Reported diabetes Reported thyroid disease endocrine disorder Using medication birth control , paracetamol , aspirin , hey fever asthma Antibiotic use < 2 month study Reported intolerance , allergy , like research food Vegetarian Current dietary fibre supplementation Fasting glucose level > 5.8 mmol/l Experienced problem draw blood past Thesis student employee division Human Nutrition Volunteers participate ProVe study
